```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(leaflet)
library(rvest)
library(httr)
```

## Medicaid Enrolled Provider Location Mapping

Medicaid provides health coverage to low-income people and is one of the largest payers for health care in the United States.

```{r}
medicaid_provider = GET("https://health.data.ny.gov/resource/keti-qx5t.csv",
                        query = list("$limit" = 10000)) %>% 
  content("parsed") 
  #select(-file_date, -medically_fragile_children_directory_ind, -provider_email)
```



```{r}
leaflet(medicaid_provider) %>% 
  addProviderTiles(providers$Esri.NatGeoWorldMap) %>% 
  addMarkers(lat = ~latitude, 
             lng = ~longitude, 
             clusterOptions = markerClusterOptions())
```
